registrations.title: Violin
registrations.description: 1912 ash violin with some ivory in the bow

registrations.title: Piano
registrations.description: Steinway grand piano made in 1894. It has ivory on most of the keys. Some replacements have been made with bovine bone in recent years.

registrations.title: Portrait miniature
registrations.description: Ivory portrait miniature of a victorian lady holding an angry looking cat.

registrations.title: Ivory figure of a boy
registrations.description: A lovely ivory figure of a boy. In good overall condition. Exact age unknown.
